Book 30 minutes to confirm safe-harbor projections

documents.title: Kitchen Estimate Playbook
documents.author: Mike's Remodeling
documents.summary: Step-by-step template the crew uses when scoping a mid-range kitchen remodel, including quick pricing ranges and the exact questions Mike asks during the first visit.

sections.heading: Walkthrough checklist
sections.body:
- Photograph electrical, plumbing, and appliance runs
- Confirm ceiling height + bulkheads
- Capture cabinet linear feet + island footage
- Ask for flooring transition preference

sections.heading: Pricing guardrails
sections.body:
| Scope | Typical Range | Notes |
| :--- | ---: | :--- |
| Essential refresh | $38k - $45k | Stock cabinets + quartz |
| Premium upgrade | $52k - $68k | Custom fronts, panel-ready appliances |
| Gut + layout move | $72k+ | Requires structural review |

sections.heading: Client script
sections.body:
"What is the one thing you never want to touch again after we hand over keys?"
"How long can you be without a kitchen before it impacts the family too much?"

content.plain_excerpt: Template Mike's Remodeling uses to baseline every kitchen opportunity, with photos to capture, price ranges, and the discovery script that keeps expectations aligned.

documents.search_blob: kitchen remodel estimate template mike's remodeling discovery questions pricing guardrails

documents.title: Q1 Cash Flow Bridge
documents.author: Bizzi Assistant
documents.summary: Bizzi pulled this bridge to explain how Q1 cash will move across receivables, payroll, material deposits, and tax savings for Mike's Remodeling.

sections.heading: Starting point
sections.body:
Cash on hand 1/1/25: $24.2k
Backlog deposits collected: $18.5k

sections.heading: Major movements
sections.body:
| Driver | Impact | Timing |
| :--- | ---: | :--- |
| AR from Elm + Hawthorne | +$32.6k | Jan 18 - Feb 2 |
| Payroll (12 carpenters) | -$46.8k | Bi-weekly |
| Custom cabinets deposits | -$14.4k | Feb 6 |
| Tax set-aside (quarterly) | -$6.2k | Mar 15 |

sections.heading: What to watch
sections.body:
- Keep $15k buffer for overlapping tile installs
- Collect final draw on Greenway HOA before new marketing spend
- If AR slips two weeks, push the Ford Transit upgrade to May

content.plain_excerpt: Bridge shows cash dipping to $11k mid-February if Hawthorne lags, so Bizzi flags the need to chase receivables and stagger cabinet deposits.
